title: Banana Cheesecake with Banana Cream Pie Topping
ingredients: 1 cup fat-free frozen whipped topping, thawed
instructions: 1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 2. Mix cookie crumbs and butter together in a bowl. Press mixture into the bottom of a 9-inch springform pan. 3. Mix cream cheese and sugar together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and well blended. Add eggs one at a time, mixing after each addition. Stir in mashed banana and vanilla extract. Pour mixture into crust in the springform pan. 4. Bake in the preheated oven until center is almost set, 50 to 60 minutes. Cool completely, at least 1 hour, before removing from pan. 5. Whisk milk and pudding mix together in a bowl until thoroughly combined. Fold in whipped topping. 6. Arrange sliced bananas on top of cooled cheesecake. Spread pudding mixture on top. Chill at least 3 hours before serving.
